DOC.brief_summary: A 12 week trial of Adalimumab in subjects with active erosive inflammatory OA who have ahd an inadequate response to NSAID therapy
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Trial of Adalimumab for the Treatment of Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Age 45 or older, >/=2 tender and 2 swollen joints, inadequate response to NSAID therapy, hand radiographs with evidence of erosive changes, acceptable form of birth control Autoimmune arthropathy, History of psoriasis, Previous TNF therapy, current use of any DMARD, evidence of TB, history of Hep C, B, or HIV
